IPEKE.IS.long_name: Ipek Dogal Enerji Kaynaklari Arastirma ve Üretim A.S.
IPEKE.IS.summary: Ipek Dogal Enerji Kaynaklari Arastirma ve Ãretim A.S. focuses on the development and exploration of petroleum, natural gas, coal, and other natural energy resources. It holds exploration licenses interests in the Kozluk and Sirvan projects located in Turkey. The company is based in Ankara, Turkey.

MEPET.IS.long_name: Mepet Metro Petrol ve Tesisleri Sanayi Ticaret A.S.
MEPET.IS.summary: Mepet Metro Petrol ve Tesisleri Sanayi Ticaret A.S. owns and operates gas stations and recreational facilities in Turkey. The company operates 24 fuel stations that sells fuel and petroleum products. It also offers road recreational services to bus passengers, private vehicle passengers, and long road drivers; and other services in the tourism sector. The company is based in Istanbul, Turkey.

TCF.CN.summary: Trillion Energy International Inc., together with its subsidiaries, operates as an oil and gas exploration, and production company in Bulgaria and Turkey. It owns oil and gas producing assets in Turkey; and a coal bed methane exploration license in Bulgaria. The company was formerly known as Park Place Energy Inc. and changed its name to Trillion Energy International Inc. in April 2019. Trillion Energy International Inc. was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Ankara, Turkey.

TUPRS.IS.summary: TÃ¼rkiye Petrol Rafinerileri A.S., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the refining crude oil, petroleum, and chemical products in Turkey and internationally. It is also involved in the purchase, sale, import, export, storage, and marketing of petroleum products, LPG, and natural gas. The company's products include liquid petroleum gases, fuel oils, base oils, waxes, extracts, and bitumen and bitumen binders, as well as white spirits, cutting oils, clarified oils, petroleum coke, and sulphur products. In addition, it engages in the transportation of crude oil and petroleum products; operation of factories and facilities in petrochemical and energy related industries; and air, maritime, road, and rail transportation activities, as well as provision of mooring and tug services. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in KÃ¶rfez, Turkey. TÃ¼rkiye Petrol Rafinerileri A.S. is a subsidiary of Enerji Yatirimlari A.S.
